subject: Re: [junit][:-)] Tick tick tick
msgSnippet: ... timing ... probably ... slowly ... great, interesting idea! but I doubt its usefulness in real works.
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Erik Meade" <emeade@...> wrote:
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: dcorbin@...
> > [mailto:dcorbin@...]On Behalf Of David Corbin
> > Sent: Saturday, November 18, 2000 4:30 PM
> > To: junit@egroups.com
> > Subject: Re: [junit][:-)] Tick tick tick
> >
> >
> > >
> > > What a great idea!
> > >
> >
> > I have them now and then :) When will you have it done :)
>
> We should have an open source site host soon.
>
> > I suspect that for people experienced in "the short-cycle" the
timing
> > thing happens "innately", but for those of us learning, it will
probably
> > be a great training tool...
>
> I think it's a good idea in general, it could be reinforced by
slowly
> turning the green bar red.
>
> Erik
great, interesting idea! but I doubt its usefulness in real works.
